website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use pointer. It costs more than some other choices, but it has a lot of devoted fans.
pros: Comfortable in the hand with a range of 50 feet
cons: Some say the laser isn't strong enough for larger presentations

customer_reviews.title: Used with our PICC machines laptop
customer_reviews.text: worked great out of the box with no hassle with the drivers. Windows 8 format on the BARD shell for our Peripherally Inserted Central Catheter machine (Sonosite). Got two because I accidentally threw the original pointer :) three stars for te volume control as we dont need that feature. 3 for the value for the money as this can be cheaper :)
customer_reviews.author: Gads Tech

customer_reviews.title: ... line of work and this is hands down the best wireless presenter remote I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I give presentations everyday in my line of work and this is hands down the best wireless presenter remote I have ever had! In the course of a year I have only had to change the battery once. It is simple to use, reliable and compact. Many clients of mine who have borrowed it during shared presentations end up purchasing one. One of the best features is that the USB stick fits inside the battery compartment, keeping it safe and nearly impossible to loose over time like other remotes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: but I liked it enough to purchase a second one so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a technology teacher and use this every day. It makes my job so much easier! I do not have any other similar products to compare it to, but I liked it enough to purchase a second one so I could have one at each school I teach at (I travel between two schools). The kids find it super impressive too (lol). I don't use the mouse feature and think its easier to just go back to the computer thats hooked to the projector if I need to use the mouse, but I do like and use all the other features.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomics much better than that of Logitech's
customer_reviews.text: This or the AMP09US is a much better alternative to the Logitech Wireless Presenter R400. I had a Targus, misplaced it and bought a Logitech locally. Yes it's more slick, but I've found the forward button placement just above the screen blackout button on the Logitech to be a VERY POOR DESIGN. I don't have big fingers (or a large thumb) but I kept pressing the adjacent screen blackout button if I wasn't careful. Attention to pressing the correct button distracted me from making the best presentation. I rebought the Targus and I'm on autopilot again advancing slides, and can concentrate on content rather than fumbling with the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Juliann

customer_reviews.title: Not cool.
customer_reviews.text: I needed the mouse for a presentation, it doesn't work very nicely, unless you have little nimble fingers. The center black tiny joystick is about 1/4" diameter, it is almost impossible to move without it pressing down and "left clicking" all over the place. The small switch in the middle front selects between laser or remote mode, its a little tough to flip back n forth between the two, plus the white ring is supposed to be Green in Mouse mode and Red in Laser mode. Before the presentation the Green light was on in either mode. Maybe the switch failed? The unit in very small and awkward if you have bigger hands. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: TechGeek1

customer_reviews.title: Red laser may not show up at all on certain screens, LCDs, etc.
customer_reviews.text: This pointer worked first time with no difficult install instructions. Single AAA battery goes in negative end first. USB receiver stows in battery compartment. Buttons are clean and easy to see with lighted ring. I used this on Windows 7 laptop and also on a desktop. There is a switch for MAC user inside the battery compartment. Forward and backward slideshow with laser pointer in center. Point toward screen since RF does not need to be directed toward PC or laptop device where USB receiver is connected. Simple operation for my wife who does not like high tech. She is the primary user.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: it shows up fine on a regular projector
customer_reviews.text: Used this recently for a presentation and it worked well. I actually gave the presentation for a local archeaological club meeting which was held in a private home instead of a public conference room. So, what I didn't anticipate was that the presentations would be projected on a home's TV screen (instead of a projection screen). So the remote laser pointer feature didn't show up well which was a little frustrating. However, it shows up fine on a regular projector. So a separate laser pointer may need to be used. Otherwise, all of the other features worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Sangster

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a spare
customer_reviews.text: I lecture for a living and already have one of these. In fact, this is my third. The first one was lost (probably left behind at some lecture). When I switched to my spare, I bought a new backup. Small, good range, good batter life. One tip: The USB plug is tiny. Get a short USB extension cable and plug into that. Otherwise you'll forget about it, put your laptop back into your case, and break the plug off.(And it took forever to get the remaining half of the USB out of the laptop USB port.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kalman

customer_reviews.title: Now works with Mountain Lion on Mac
customer_reviews.text: Original Review: Great product I've used for a long time. I frequently recommended this remote to friends. Now it no longer works with the latest OS from Apple: Mountain Lion. Very frustrating. I wish the company would say something instead of continuing to see a product that no longer works. Edit: 10 October 2012 After calling Targus, they mailed me a new unit free of charge that works correctly on the new macs. This is excellent customer service and it's clear that new units have been fixed and no longer have this flaw. Excellent product for the price. Back to 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jenson

customer_reviews.title: The battery cover does not open and close very easily, and it won't take much to snap off ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery cover does not open and close very easily, and it won't take much to snap off the small prongs that are supposed to hold it on. I just keep the whole remote in a ziploc bag and keep the usb transmitter outside the whole time. I put up with it because it's the only remote I've ever found that allows you to control the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Janice L.

customer_reviews.title: it is defected !
customer_reviews.text: The coating on the surface got sticky and unusable. So disappointed! You don't want to buy it. Don't waste your time and money. I returned and waiting for a refund. I am still waiting for the refund. it has been a week now since I shipped back the product. I will update once I got the refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best PowerPoint Clicker for Macs
customer_reviews.text: I have a Macbook and found that this particular laser pointer "clicker" works best for me. This is my second one as the previous one got damaged after years of use. That particular model had a storage compartment for a spare battery but this one doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: CyanSkies

customer_reviews.title: Has some glitches
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old Targus clicker. It's ok and does the job...although I'd prefer my old one back :/ this one doesn't always want to turn on when I tell it too. Sometimes it take a single push and sometimes I have sit there and hold the button before it will come up. When it's locked I have the same issue. To unlock it sometimes it takes a click sometimes I have to hold. In short I have to fiddle with it often to get it to do what I want....and it always does...eventually
customer_reviews.author: jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Best remote ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this one because I can use it as a clicker or switch over to remote mouse. I present very often, so this is the best option for me. I've left the USB on location twice, but I always come back to Amazon to purchase this one. I haven't been able to find it anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Nice Presentation Clicker
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a board presentation at work. Presenter's used with extreme ease. No complaints. No confusion. Simple plug and play action. Durable and ergonomic feel. Will consider other products from this company when the need arises. Works with Adobe Acrobat reader + professional to move between slides. Also works with Power Point. Reads that it works with Keynote too. Has different switch settings to adjust to choose which program this will assist with when you need it. Really like it. Good looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but range not as described
customer_reviews.text: Got this wireless pointer for my first teaching job. Love the ability to control my lecture without being tethered to the computer. Storage for the dongle in the device is perfect. I would probably lose it otherwise. However, the range is not as far as the description says. At about 10 feet, it works inconsistently. Fortunately, I do not need to be that far from the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S.

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I unpackaged it, plugged it in, and it worked flawlessly in both my mid 2012 MacBook Pro and my 2007 MacBook, primarily using Keynote for presentations. I stand about 30 feet in front of the projection screen with bright lighting, and the red laser is quite visible. I was expecting to struggle to open the case from other reviews, but I find it easy to open and close, and easy to get the usb dongle in and out from it's storage slot. For a basic presentation device, I couldn't be more happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hesselbarth

customer_reviews.title: Got this for teaching
customer_reviews.text: I am an adjunct professor at a local community college. I use an Keynote on an Apple MacBook Pro. I had been using the remote that came with it, but I was limited to the front of the lap top since it used infrared. The USB dongle makes it easier to give a lecture and wander around the class room. The laser pointer is an added plus. It sets between PC, Mac Keynote, and Mac PowerPoint. It is a functional and versatile tool for presentations of all sorts.
customer_reviews.author: K. Springs

customer_reviews.title: Simply Great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Works great on my Win7, no dirvers required, all buttons have nice functions: - Prev. and next slide (nothing weird) - on/off display - Exit presentation mode and return to power point normal view, where prev and next buttons continue working; so you can exit presentation mode and look for the slide you need quickly and return to presentation mode or full screen mode again using this button. - Laser button. Simply Great!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis G.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product is light weight with a comfortable grip. The buttons respond when touched---one does not have to "squeeze" or "push down hard" to get the desired feature's results. The laser is bright and easy to see. I am a classroom teacher and have use this device for two weeks now and have been satisfied. The 50 foot range is nice. My only complaint is that I have to point directly at my receiver for my slide presentation to move forward and sometimes the kids are sitting in direct line of site. Still, for the reduced final price ($17.00 at the time) I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: William Kendrat

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first attempt to use it.
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this in October and just attempted to use it for the first time in January. It did not work and I kept receiving a hardware malfunction error. Very disappointed. I even had out IT person look it and they couldn't get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: chris mircea

customer_reviews.title: Works great - much better design than the previous version.
customer_reviews.text: I owned the previous Targus laser presentation remote... It does the exact same thing except this one is much sturdier and has a green/red LED light around the middle button. The last version had cheap buttons - the right side totally tore off. This version doesn't have rubber buttons and seems well made. The battery also lasts long - It's been over a year of use and I still haven't had to replace the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: is a product of poor quality,
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I am a university professor and wanted to change my old targus laser pointer, I received as a Christmas gift and when I received it, while opening the package was already broken, fortunately Amazon replaced it immediately. But my surprise is that by receiving the second, also was broken at the top. Similarly, Amazon replaced it, still do not get the third pointer, but I recommend NOT purchasing this item, the quality of materials is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicio Mora

customer_reviews.title: Great Low Price MacBook Presentation Remote
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the hardest problem I had was finding a presentation remote compatible with my Mac Book Air. This item is great, it has the option of using it for Powerpoint for Mac, or Mac Keynote. The price on Amazon was half the price that I purchased this item at staples office supplies. I was able to successfully return this and Amazon prime allowed me to receive this product in two business days
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for its price! MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for college and several class presentations, it feels comfortable in your hand and it has quite a range in a large classroom. This is a very good product for its price, buy it and you wont regret it, it looks very durable and it's absolutely cool, I love the fact that it is iluminated for low light conditions. Works as stated in the description, if I had to buy a new presentation remote, I would get this one for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Targus Laser Presentation Remote - I lost the first one. I love it! As a woman who does a lot of presentations, this fits in my hand, without being so obvious that it looks like I'm holding a "clicker." I also love that it works from across a large room - I can move throughout the room in ease and be assured that wherever I am, I can click. No reason to get another - this is just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: R. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a while.
customer_reviews.text: I am a school teacher and use it daily. I purchased the remote in September, and have not dropped it (a feat, I know). It has just stopped working, it stopped working intermittently, but now does not work at all. The computer recognizes the usb dongle is plugged in, but there is no communication with the computer. There is a small reset under the battery plate, it does not work. I would recommend purchasing a different remote.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kenny

customer_reviews.title: An easy-to-use gem for PowerPoint presentations
customer_reviews.text: If you do PowerPoint presentations, you owe it to yourself to get one of these marvelous devices. It frees you from the tyranny of the laptop or desktop computer; with it you're free to wander the room while talking to your presentation. The design is elegant--when not in use, the USB dongle nestles into a place inside the device, along with a spare battery. The people who designed this were thinking two steps ahead. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nobody puts Baby in the corner, tied to a desk...
customer_reviews.text: Free yourself from wired technology. Best invention ever for presenters, educators, etc. Allows me to interact with my audience, which I’m not so sure they always love! This was a gift for a friend who was so easily thrilled by mine. May it serve her well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a decent product however don't loss the ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a decent product however don't loss the receiver or else you will have to throw it out and buy another. Also the design of the battery cover is not ideal, when taking it on and off there is two plastic tabs which get bent causing it not to close correctly. I have ordered 100's of these and everyone is the same so just be aware and be careful when putting the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Tied to the Computer Station in Lecture
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing! I'm a smaller woman, and it fits very comfortably and naturally in my hand. I haven't tested the range too much yet, but I'm sure it will be fine in my small classrooms. I love the power button, so I can put it in my teaching bag and be sure that the flash drive won't press against it and run my batteries down. The only very minor con I can think of is that the USB fob is a little small and my college has the computer tower on the floor, so I have to actively think about the need to grab the fob before I leave.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Back cover broke within a month
customer_reviews.text: I got this 6 months ago and it still works, but the back cover (where the batteries go) won't close. I didn't do anything, but it is rather annoying. You can't just tape it closed either, because you have to open and close it to store the USB piece back there. Other than that, it is great. Works with PC and Mac, the laser is great, all the buttons work and it is very straight-forward.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install & use
customer_reviews.text: This laser pointer installed itself after plugging in the USB receiver, and it worked like a charm. I had to read the included instruction packet because the auxiliary button icons weren't intuitive. The forward and backward buttons give nice tactile feedback and the main pointer button is easy to find without looking at the device. I read a bunch of reviews before deciding on this model, and it lived up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: VanessaB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: It's small size and sleek design make this easy to use. I teach a graduate class where my computer is in an ackward spot in the room, with this remote, I can operate my presentations from anywhere in the room. the USB link, conveniently stores in the battery compartment and is accessed easily by pushing the release mechanism on the back. It fits easily into my hand and is extremely light. I has convenient lock button next to the on/off switch. This is great so when I am talking and waving my hands around I don't accidently push buttons. The laser pointer is in the center button, works well. Well integrated small and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent technology, perfect for giving public PowerPoint presentations.
customer_reviews.text: If you're giving a PowerPoint presentation and don't have one of these, your missing one of the great timesavers. No more hunching over a keyboard to advance to the next slide, or calling out to your assistant who's hunched over a keyboard; just press the button. Also, the laser pointer is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why won't it turn off?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is bizarre. It has a power button, but even when turned off it is ALWAYS turning on the green light that lights up the navigation buttons resulting in quick battery drain. No matter what I try, as soon as I put it in my laptop bag, that dumb green light turns on and stays on - draining the battery. I threw it in the trash and went back to the Logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Works great with windows and mac.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to view PowerPoint presentations for both windows(XP and 7) and Mac(OS X Lion). The device works flawlessly. The only problem is that the lock button doesn't work (that is why gave it 4 stars). Did not contact customer support as I wouldn't really be needing the lock functionality as long as the slide-changer, presentation starter and the laser pointer work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Nammy

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: I teach school and use it everyday in my classroom. I usually go through two a year (I can't get approval to buy a more expense, higher quality one). They are cheap and seem to give out on my at the most inopportune times. Planned obsolescence works for them, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly & Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I researched the Targus products and found this to be the most appropriate for my kind of use and a very good compromise between price and features. My work is training and consulting with lots of overseas travel - this is a handy easy to pack lightweight gadget, nice store-in for the USB avoiding being misplced. Handy design and user friendly. Highly recommended. Delivery of product was timely from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jayantha R de Silva

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, especially if you need a mouse.
customer_reviews.text: Good little remote. Wish the buttons were a little more pronounced, but you get used to it. Mouse function was why I purchased this and it works just like it should. Haven't had any trouble with it feeling cheap or anything. Wish the cover was a little easier to come off, but so far so good. Tried some other brand that had much higher reviews, but the buttons were just way too small for me to use comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Hines

customer_reviews.title: AMP09 Review
customer_reviews.text: Item not as described. Opened battery compartment to find no extra battery slot. Also product has limitations, only works properly with specific brand computers. Wouldn't be a problem if I would have known that beforehand. Will not work properly with Samsung brand laptop. Mouse joystick feels extremely flimsy, and I'm afraid I may break it after awhile of normal wear and tear. Works perfectly with my dell computer though, which is the one I bought it for. It would have been nice to have known that it would not have worked with my personal laptop before I bought it. Overall for the price it's an okay product. Doesn't blow me out of the water though.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Targus, and I've owned three of these now, but sadly they're poorly made and keep breaking. I wouldn't spend my own money on this. I'm a teacher and spend my school's money, which is why I've continued to buy the same product three times... I'm hoping they can fix the issues and make a longer lasting product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Does everything you need it to. Only issue is you can’t control the cursor and have the laser at the same time. You have to switch between functions. Overall it’s a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel J. Earlen

customer_reviews.title: NEVER worked wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pointer before so I know exactly how it works. I bought this one as a back up so did not open the package immediately. I did today. It does not work, even with several new batteries attempted. Also the back does not fit well. totally defective product. And now it is too late to return. I cannot believe I received such a defective product and am out all of this money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carole E. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for the presentation computers in our training center. They work great. One thing I found is if you forget to turn them off, the battery will only last a day. Other than that, it does just what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: presentation mode just wouldn't work
customer_reviews.text: Presenter mouse worked as an air mouse, but presentation mode operations/buttons had no effect except for slide-show-end button. Same no-op behavior on MAC and PC. Targus support first suggested my device might be defective, so I exchanged for new one, new one failed to work in same way. Targus support offered useless, repetitive advice through multiple emails.
customer_reviews.author: Patient Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for presentations
customer_reviews.text: This remote is easy to use and has a long range, which is great for presentations where the laptop or other equipment is on the other side of the room. The pointer works well, although I find I don't use it as much as I expected to. The extra battery is a neat feature, and I really like how the USB wireless unit tucks into the remote so it doesn't get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Von Solos

customer_reviews.title: Works great, every time!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time in purchasing these, because people keep stealing them from me at work- because they work so well! Love this one. Great design, reliable and comfortable to hold. Will likely purchase again next time someone walks off with these.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for two boardrooms at work and they are working great. They require no setup because the computer sees them as a keyboard and they work great with powerpoint. The execs like the integrated laser pointer and it feel pretty comfortable in the hand. All in all it works exactly as I expected them to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S

customer_reviews.title: Good price for good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great with presentations using PowerPoint. Doesn't feel cheap at all, rubberized finish enhances grip, not too big and fits firmly in hand. Worked perfrectly with Win7. Gave 4 stars because only time will tell if this is reliable/durable. I hope its not a disposable model.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Disposable quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a flimsy product that does not withstand any amount of normal usage. I used it occasionally in the classroom over a period of 5 months and the remote just stopped working. The laser still works, but the rest of it is useless. If you want an expensive cat toy, this is your device.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied. Though it took me a minute to find the transmitter in the battery case, it worked form the very start. It is perfect for someone who wants to control their PowerPoint (TM) presentations and use a simple laser pointer, which is all I needed.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Really good remote.
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect with my new MacBook Pro. The range is good and all the functions work. Yes, it's a little big. But it's not so big that it's difficult to use/function during a presentation. I really like the USB adapter being stored inside the remote. All in all it's a good remote that does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Senecal

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: My Targus Presentation Remote is fine, but you get what you pay for. If you're someone who will constantly be presenting, it would be best to go ahead and buy something of a better quality. It's worked well for me and never shorted out, but I can never walk too far away from the computer, and it just feels cheap in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: B. Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Works well, I wish the buttons were larger and easier to find without looking
customer_reviews.text: I lost the USB key to my old, trusty InFocus/Interlink remote which I loved. That one had keys that were raised so you could find them instinctively without looking. The new Targus seems to have given up usability in favor of a clean, sleek look and feel. While that may appeal to many, I prefer function over form.
customer_reviews.author: R. V. Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Targus usually provides some quality hardware when it comes to devices like this. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This works extremely well. It has a long range on it which is something that we needed. We have had no issues with this. Targus usually provides some quality hardware when it comes to devices like this. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: zachary hill

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Small. I went to Staples and priced this knowing the Amazon price. $15.00 more at staples.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic, inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This little Targus laser pointer and presentation remote does pretty well. I like it because it is light, works in any computer, and the USB dongle stores in the battery compartment. However, if you drop it a few times (which I am wont to do) it tends to fall apart pretty quick. But, still, good remote.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Rhea Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great Presentation Remote
customer_reviews.text: This remote works for both Windows and Apple OSX. There's a switch inside the battery cover that allows you select what operating system and program you'll be using the remote with. This remote also allows you to use it as a mouse with full drag-n-drop functionality. I did my research on what remote I wanted and was able to get it here instead of the large-chain office store for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. A.

customer_reviews.title: Two for one
customer_reviews.text: I use this when teaching my classes. So much better than using a wireless presenter and also a laser. This combines the two - the only trick is remembering which button to push!
customer_reviews.author: Jann Howell

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job. The only thing I don't like about ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy. Does a great job. The only thing I don't like about it is that you have to take the battery out when I put it in my bag or the battery dies. This is because the power button is easily actuated by other items in the bag. Love it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Beek

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! for a teacher thats a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my classroom and i love it! It works amazing...laser works but i dont use i fear slamming a kids eye by accident. But i do use it on days where I'm presenting grammar/notes!
customer_reviews.author: N. Pena

customer_reviews.title: Simple clicker, does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt expecting anything advanced but it serves the purpose. * It can launch the presentation * Moves slides forward and backward * Laser works! I did get a piece that didnt work on MS 2010 on Win 7. However Targus replaced it in time. So the support works too!
customer_reviews.author: Balaji V

customer_reviews.title: A great product but a bit delicate.
customer_reviews.text: It works very well when it works. My first one died after a year but I bought 2 more because I like what it does so now I have a backup in case the new one stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Young

customer_reviews.title: remote
customer_reviews.text: Having difficulty connecting to laptop using wireless projection system. THe reset buttonis encredibly small and hidden underneath the USB connection. Found that one after it took me forever to find where it was stored. The box did not include any directions/ users guide, diagram - nada.
customer_reviews.author: jlin

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of presentations, or run tech for others' presentations. This remote has been a very useful tool for every event. Lightweight, fits in my purse or laptop bag easily, and doesn't often need a battery replacement. Would recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Samuelson

customer_reviews.title: I love that this remote can be used for a Mac ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this remote can be used for a Mac or a PC. It is easy to use and has functioned frequently and seamlessly for over a year. The only problem is that the two little plastic prongs inside bend then break, making closing the unit difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great user friendly remote
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line: plug it in and do powerpoints from anywhere in room. Laser pointer is easy to use - could be a bit brighter but no problem as is. Nice set of controls also easy to use - especially those for turning off image and for switching back to desktop image from powerpoint. Allows me to forget about projector/laptop and focus on presentation.
customer_reviews.author: tux

customer_reviews.title: Great basic pointer and remote
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent entry level presentation remote and laser pointer. It accomplished everything that our presenters wanted in a device. It was very easy and intuitive to use and a snap to install. Having a compartment inside the battery area for the usb dongle was a great touch.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M. Peery

customer_reviews.title: Great little presenter
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second pointer in 1 week. The first one had the power button fail after 5 mins of light use. That's the only reason I marked it down. Amazon rapidly shipped me a replacement, which so far has worked very well. PROS Fits nicely in hand with rubber grips Good laser pointer Play button for powerpoint Internal storage for USB key Spare battery inside pointer CONS Spare battery makes it heavy Reasonably large No protective case Side buttons are flimsy Play button always skips back to slide #1
customer_reviews.author: Kemyst

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Efficient, Compact
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely one of the most affordable clickers I found on the market, it's compatible with both Mac and PC, and the USB fits conveniently into the back next to the battery. The only negative I can say about this particular model is that it doesn't have space for a spare battery (a feature I have seen in either a newer or older version of this same model). All in all I'd say this product is one that no lecturer or presenter should go without!
customer_reviews.author: SamE

customer_reviews.title: Great but easy to break
customer_reviews.text: Works great but be careful because when trying to take the battery out it's easy to break out the plastic tabs that hold this thing together.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Torres

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works simply as intended. No extra unnecessary features.
customer_reviews.author: YoungLo

customer_reviews.title: A handy tool
customer_reviews.text: My original presentation remote died on me so I got this one. It's only been used twice since I bought it. So far, so good. I like that the usb fits inside the remote while not in use. It took me a minute to figure out how to use it but I am sure more use will turn me from novice to expert.
customer_reviews.author: K. Alkins

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!!
customer_reviews.text: Being a corporate trainer in the midst of a WW CRM rollout I trained hundreds of people over a two week period. This little gem made life more interesting and afforded me the mobility to get out from behind the podium. Not to mention one of the other trainers looked at this same item at Staples and it was double the price. So needless to say I sent her the info from my purchase and she bought two for her group. Great product, received in about a day. Couldn't say anything more positive about it.... if you do a lot of public speaking using presentations this little gadget is for you.
customer_reviews.author: SusiesQueue

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price on Amazon. My only complaint is the battery door. You store the dongle in there and the button release is a pain to open and close. I have a feeling I will end up breaking the door with continued use..
customer_reviews.author: yeahright

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like the included laser pointer and the ease of the button layout. My only complaint is that the storage door for the usb connector/battery compartment is a little fragile and can snap easily. For the price as a teacher I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget, not for my Mac
customer_reviews.text: In concept and in function on a PC it's probably great but does not work with my 2014 MacBook Air and the latest operating system. For the right application this is probably a "Love It" rating, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great for business
customer_reviews.text: I work for a large medical device company and we needed to upgrade our clickers. Someone had one and we liked it so much we ordered a lot more. When those came in, others were so impressed with them that I am now ordering even more. High quality, laser works very well, clicker can work for at least 30 feet away I found, and last a long time. Hard to imagine a better clicker.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Laser Remote / Pointer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Targus Laser Remote my first had a space for a spare battery which was great. This unit only has a space for one battery. My first one the clicker mechanism filed and became stuck so I had to buy another one. The functions are great.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device for those that carry out a lot of presentations. The remote has a good range and the laser pointer is useful (depending on light conditions). Would give it 5 stars if the laser pointer was more powerful to cater for presentations in bright rooms.
customer_reviews.author: H P

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do for my presentations
customer_reviews.text: Used at a high school - so easy to set up and use. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dourov

customer_reviews.title: Love this clicker
customer_reviews.text: I do multiple presentations a week, sometimes a day. I need a reliable clicker that would last awhile and I have been very happy with this one! I have been using this clicker for a year and a half and have not issues at all. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Good remote although laser must be improved!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable in your hand (you know that you play with it during presentations!). Very clever design to keep inside the USB key for the remote and even to include an extra battery in case you need it (you know... it's very common that it will happen when you need it the most). The only thing I'd like to change is the laser, it's too small and sometimes loses visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Serge_G

customer_reviews.title: good customer service
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this item for my business but it was the wrong item.i couldnt return the item anymore because the package was damage but i had it for 2days.the owner of the company called me a wanted to satisfy my needs.very nice guy.gave me a credit and thats how you suppose to take care of your customer.will probably look into doing business again with them.. thank you
customer_reviews.author: adi

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: So many products these days are a little hard to get going and harder to understand. This little computer remote and presentation laser are as easy as hooking it up and pressing the buttons to change the slide and point. Ingenious.
customer_reviews.author: John Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Does not have cursor/mouse control.
customer_reviews.text: It seems solid and I have used Targus presenters before and they are solid products, but ... some reviews made it sound like it also could be used as a remote mouse. NO it cannot. It is a presenter, a BIG presenter, and that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Family Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Great presentation remote!
customer_reviews.text: This remote is so simple to use! Plug and play, nothing to install. It's worked 40 feet away from my laptop, feels good in the hand, and has a handy "store the receiver in the remote" feature so you never lose the receiver. I own 2 of these, one with the laser pointer and one without.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent device. It performs even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent device. It performs even better than I expected; I have had not problems with it and the price is right. My only complaint was taking the cover off to get to the batteries. Could not do it with my finger or thumb. Had to use the end of pen to push the little tab down to pop the cover off. I wish it was easier as that is where the UBS connection is stored. Definitely a 5 star slide advancer.
customer_reviews.author: Frank  Kepley

customer_reviews.title: Remote Perfect match for Mac & PC
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for me and one for a friend. We inserted the batteries (included) and set the remote for the appropriate computer type. We chose a Powerpoint/Keynote presentation, and both worked perfectly. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: OK, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the push button to open the dongle/battery compartment. Just waiting for it to break, seems flimsy ... but it hasn't broken yet! BTW, this works great with Chromebook and Chrome OS.
customer_reviews.author: QYC

customer_reviews.title: Will never present without it.
customer_reviews.text: I've used other remotes, but this one feels better than all of them. It's super easy to use, feels great in the hand, and I don't accidentally confuse the buttons or hit the wrong one. It stores the battery and USB inside, so that's a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: great for Toastmasters speeches
customer_reviews.text: I am in Toastmasters and give speeches often. For anyone who gives power point presentations, this is a must have. It also can be used on any computer easily.
customer_reviews.author: Stevemorris

customer_reviews.title: I liked my old one better, but its still nice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another presentation remote after it was stolen. The remote works great and has keys that light up, which is a plus. However, it is a bit awkward to hold. Also, I prefer a switch to turn it on rather than a button, but that's just my personal preference. Would be nice if it had media control keys. (e.g. play/pause, next, previous, stop, etc)
customer_reviews.author: Zach Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I went out and bought a much better one at a local store and have been very ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and after less than one month of use the wireless presenter stopped working. It stopped switching or advancing the slides from the PowerPoint to the next. I went out and bought a much better one at a local store and have been very happy since.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: randomly stops working if it has been on for a ...
customer_reviews.text: randomly stops working if it has been on for a long time. requires taking batteries out and putting them back in. that's probably the last thing you want to happen in a presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Jaren Havell

customer_reviews.title: it's an amazing tool. I really enjoy the laser function
customer_reviews.text: I find that anything made by Targus is made well. This is one of their lower end remotes, but other than changing the battery every once in a while, it's an amazing tool. I really enjoy the laser function, as it's very handy in exercising the cats... I mean emphasizing points of a presentation and the control buttons are just as responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Kort Everett Jackson

customer_reviews.title: worked ok for a month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product primarily because the dongle looked small enough that I might be able to permanently leave it in the machine. Alas, it was bigger than it looked and so that feature ended up not being so beneficial. The next observation I made was that the laser is very faint. Finally, after 1 month, it just stopped working. Batteries are fine, and it lights up (and the laser works), but the clicker function no longer works. Strike three.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Cattani

customer_reviews.title: Great Remote for Multi-Classrooms
customer_reviews.text: This remote allowed me to install 4 each into 4 different classrooms. There was no interference between classrooms. The laser pointer is strong and the device is very comfortable to hold and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great as expected! The color red does is absorbed on an LED screen or monitor and cannot be seen. However, this is no fault of the laser product. It did make me wonder whether the option to switch to another color might be a "next version" possibility.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn W. Puckett

product_meta.title: Targus Wireless USB Multimedia Presentation Remote, Black with Grey (AMP09US)
product_meta.description: Style:Wireless USB Multimedia Presentation RemoteThe Targus Multimedia Presentation Remote features a simplistic button layout making it easy to give presentations. The patent-pending Key Lock Technology locks non-essential buttons when not needed to help eliminate accidental button presses. The integrated laser pointer allows the presenter to highlight important content while the backlit buttons provide visibility in environments with low lighting. The latest RF 2.4GHz cordless technology works from up to 50ft away providing flexibility while presenting in large conference rooms or classrooms. The mini USB receiver stores inside of the presenter so it's always ready to use while the back-up battery apartment stores an emergency battery so users are always equipped to present. The device is immediately ready to use as it as stocked with high-quality AAA Energizer MAX batteries. The remote also features volume and cursor controls so you can listen to music or access other programs wirelessly. Both stylish and functional the Targus Presentation Remote is easy to operate for seamless presentations at work or school. Remote Control Supported Devices : Notebook; Personal putter Max Operating Distance : 50.00 feet Remote Control Technology : Radio Features : Built-in laser pointer voice control Key Lock Technology : 1.00 Inch Depth : 4.75 Inch Height : 1.50 Inch Battery Type : AAA Type & Support Type : Limited One Year Warranty UNSPSC Code : 52161525
feature_bullets: Simplistic layout enables users to open and operate a presentation with ease.

Wireless technology operates up to 50 feet. away for added flexibility; USB receiver stores in presenter
Laser pointer makes it easy to highlight presentation content while the back-lit buttons make it easy to present in rooms with low-lighting.

Ergonomic design feels comfortable in your hand while presenting
Cursor control for remote access to programs; control volume for music and videos remotely
